title: some sort of script typeface.
content:
need to re-create this as a sign, any ideas what typeface the top is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140319225852im_/http:/typophile.com/files/20140314_124640_6559.jpg)
author: Lorange

comments.content: need to re-create this as a sign, any ideas on what the top typeface is?

I don't see a script face, only a sans serif—  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140319225852/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/trade-gothic/")

Cropping your image to the script portion would make it easier to see.  
Don

[Flemish Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20140319225852/http:/old.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/flemish-script/)

Please do crop and resize next time, Daniel.
